name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Site Reliability Engineer with over 10 years of experience in cloud-based architecture and DevOps practices. Proficient in **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, with hands-on expertise in **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Jenkins** for automating deployments and managing microservices. Skilled in **GitHub** and **GitLab** for version control and CI/CD integration. Strong background in observability tools such as **Datadog**, **New Relic**, **Dynatrace**, **Prometheus**, and **Grafana**, ensuring robust monitoring and incident management. Proven ability to work on infrastructure as code and contribute to high-availability systems in demanding environments, including projects with VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska. A strong advocate for SLI and SLO implementations to enhance service reliability and system performance.
